SEARCH
Package net.delugan.teachly.lesson

Class LessonRestController

java.lang.Object
net.delugan.teachly.lesson.LessonRestController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/lessons") class LessonRestController extends Object
REST controller for lesson-related operations. Provides endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting lessons.

  • Method Details

    • getLessons

      @GetMapping public List<Lesson> getLessons()
      Retrieves all lessons.
      Returns:
      List of all lessons

    • getLesson

      @GetMapping("{id}") public Lesson getLesson(@PathVariable UUID id)
      Retrieves a lesson by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the lesson to retrieve
      Returns:
      The lesson with the specified ID
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no lesson is found with the given ID

    • addLesson

      @PostMapping @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public Lesson addLesson(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User oAuth2User, @RequestBody LessonRequest lessonRequest)
      Creates a new lesson.
      Parameters:
      oAuth2User - The authenticated user
      lessonRequest - The lesson data to create
      Returns:
      The created lesson

    • updateLesson

      @PutMapping("{id}") public Lesson updateLesson(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User oAuth2User, @PathVariable UUID id, @RequestBody LessonRequest lessonRequest)
      Updates an existing lesson.
      Parameters:
      oAuth2User - The authenticated user
      id - The ID of the lesson to update
      lessonRequest - The updated lesson data
      Returns:
      The updated lesson
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDeniedException - if the authenticated user is not the author of the lesson

    • deleteLesson

      @DeleteMapping("{id}") public void deleteLesson(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User oAuth2User, @PathVariable UUID id)
      Deletes a lesson.
      Parameters:
      oAuth2User - The authenticated user
      id - The ID of the lesson to delete
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDeniedException - if the authenticated user is not the author of the lesson
      NoSuchElementException - if no lesson is found with the given ID

    • generateLesson

      @PostMapping("{id}/generate") public Lesson generateLesson(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User oAuth2User, @PathVariable UUID id)
      Generates code for a lesson.
      Parameters:
      oAuth2User - The authenticated user
      id - The ID of the lesson to generate code for
      Returns:
      The lesson with generated code
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDeniedException - if the authenticated user is not the author of the lesson
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during code generation
      NoSuchElementException - if no lesson is found with the given ID

    • getTags

      @GetMapping("/tags") public List<String> getTags()
      Retrieves all unique tags used in lessons.
      Returns:
      List of all unique tags
